title: Flappy Bird
description: Create a Scratch version of Flappy Bird

steps.title: Make Flappy Bird fall
steps.description: Use a forever loop to make Flappy Bird fall

components.text: Open the **Scratch Starter Project**
Add the following script to your Flappy sprite

components.blocks:
when FLAG clicked
go to x: (-50) y: (0)
forever
	change y by (-3)
	point in direction [100 v]
end

components.text: **Click the Green Flag** - Does Flappy Bird start in the middle of the screen and then fall to the bottom?

steps.title: Make Flappy Bird flap
steps.description: Make Flappy flap upwards when you press the space bar

components.text: Change your **Flappy falling script** to the following

components.blocks:
when FLAG clicked
go to x: (-50) y: (0)
forever
	if <key [space v] pressed?> then
		next costume
		change y by (9)
		point in direction [80 v]
	else
		change y by (-3)
		point in direction [100 v]
	end
end

components.text: **Click the Green Flag** - Does Flappy Bird fly when you press the space bar?

steps.title: Add the pipes
steps.description: Next we'll add some obstacles for Flappy to fly through

components.text: Click on the **Paint new sprite** button
If the costume is in `Bitmap Mode` click **Convert to vector**
Click on the **Rectangle** button
Click **Solid Fill** button to draw a solid rectangle
Select a **Dark Green** from the color pallet
Click and drag two boxes to create the pipe shown
Select a **Light Green** from the color pallet
Click and drag two inner boxes to create the pipe shown
Click **Select** button
Drag a box around the pipe to **select it**
Click **Group** button to group the rectangles
Click **Duplicate** button then click the pipe
**Rotate the new pipe** by clicking and dragging the top handle
Position the second pipe to look like the picture shown
Click the **i** button on your sprite to name it
Name your sprite **Pipe**

steps.title: Make the pipes move
steps.description: Next we'll make the pipes move and arrange them randomly to provide an obstacle course for Flappy.

components.text: Select the `Scripts` tab of your **Pipe** sprite
Hide the Pipe sprite and start making clones

components.blocks:
when FLAG clicked
hide
forever
	create clone of [myself v]
	wait (2) secs
end

components.text: When the sprite starts as a clone move across the screen

components.blocks:
when I start as a clone
go to x: (240) y: (pick random (-80) to (80))
show
repeat (120)
	change x by (-4)
end
delete this clone

components.text: If the pipes are not big enough select the **Grow** tool and click the pipes
**Click the green flag** - Do pipes appear with gaps to fly through at different heights?
If the gap between the pipes is too small you can make the gap bigger in the **Pipe** sprite by editing the costume

steps.title: Detect collision with the pipes
steps.description: To make the game a challenge, the player needs to guide Flappy through the gaps without touching the pipes or the edges of the screen

components.text: Select the **Flappy** sprite and click on the **Scripts** tab
Add some blocks to detect if Flappy hits something

components.blocks:
when FLAG clicked
wait until ((touching [edge v]?) or (touching [Pipe v]?))
say [Game Over!]
broadcast [GameOver v]
stop [other scripts in sprite v]

components.text: Select the **Pipe** sprite and click on the **Scripts** tab
Add some blocks to stop scripts when the game is over
components.blocks:
when I receive [GameOver v]
        stop [other scripts in sprite v]

components.text: **Click the green flag** - Does the game end when Flappy touches a pipe or the edge of the screen?

steps.title: Add scoring
steps.description: The player should score a point every time Flappy makes it though a pipe

components.text: Select the **Pipe** sprite and click on the **Scripts** tab
**Make a variable** called score *for all sprites*
Add a block to set the score to 0 when the flag is clicked
Add blocks to detect when Flappy has passed the pipes

components.blocks:
when I start as a clone
wait until <(x position) < ([x position v] of [Flappy v])>
change [score v] by (1)

components.text: **Click the green flag** - Does the player score points for flying Flappy through the pipes?
**Make a variable**
Call the variable hi-score and tick the `Cloud variable (stored on server)`
When the game is over check if you need to set a new high score

components.blocks:
when I receive [GameOver v]
if <(score) > (hi-score)> then
	set [hi-score v] to (score)
end
stop [other scripts in sprite v]
